author: A_Brickset_user
title: A good, cheap set.
review:
Playability: 7/10 ( Its not meant to be played with!)
Bricks: 9/10 Lots of handy flat peices.
Minifigs: 0/10 (NONE)
Collectability: 9/10 Not avalible in stores.

I think it is pretty cool, you know.

Price: 10/10 Nice price for something this small.

WOW!!!!!!

author: bmwlego
title: I Pledge Allegiance, the the Flag, of the United States of America....
review: I bought this great little set last summer, right before the 4th of July. It is a great little set with many 1x plates. It is a solid and sturdily constructed flag that is atop my Cafe Corner as I type this. The technic pins used to give the appearance of stars is a nice touch. The amount of stripes are accurate but the set is too small to accommodate 50 stars so I can't knock this aspect. The set was highly affordable at the time of purchase and it is an easy set to create out of your spare parts. This would be a great idea for LEGO to produce flags of different nations (if they don't already). What a great marketing idea and way to show how internationally accepted the product is. Anyone from LEGO reading these reviews I wonder?
